message: Hey Bob, this is a fair offer. We'll both have something, and we'll get to enjoy the money sooner.
I'm willing to compromise and give you a decent share, but I think I deserve more since I'm making the offer this round.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's split the money more evenly this time. We'll both get a better share than we would if we keep rejecting each other's offers.
I'm getting a bit frustrated with these low offers. I think I deserve more, and I'm willing to take a risk to get it. This is my last chance to make a decent deal.
